descriptionNullable:
wikiHow Raw Data dataset consists of all relevant information about ~19.9k wikiHow articles.

The features of the [wikiHow Features](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/aniketsharma00411/wikihow-features) dataset are extracted from this raw data.

The articles are collected using the open-source tool [wikiHowUnofficialAPI](https://pypi.org/project/wikihowunofficialapi/).

How to load and use the data? Check [this](https://www.kaggle.com/code/aniketsharma00411/using-wikihow-raw-data) notebook.

The dataset is introduced in the (under review) paper Automated Quality Estimation of Collaboratively Created Content. If you find it helpful, please cite the paper.
title: wikiHow Raw Data
subtitle: Raw extracted wikiHow articles
description:
wikiHow Raw Data dataset consists of all relevant information about ~19.9k wikiHow articles.

The features of the [wikiHow Features](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/aniketsharma00411/wikihow-features) dataset are extracted from this raw data.

The articles are collected using the open-source tool [wikiHowUnofficialAPI](https://pypi.org/project/wikihowunofficialapi/).

How to load and use the data? Check [this](https://www.kaggle.com/code/aniketsharma00411/using-wikihow-raw-data) notebook.

The dataset is introduced in the (under review) paper Automated Quality Estimation of Collaboratively Created Content. If you find it helpful, please cite the paper.
